comment: Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-1994.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-11 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 6-Sep-2018.)
